item.title: Quick Tips for Data Cleaning in R
item.description: Data Cleaning (istockphoto) Enter your Email Here to get the latest from Exploring-Data in your inbox. What to Expect Iâ€™m excited to share pro-tips that will expedite your process for cleaning and standardizing column names in your data; this is a critical yet sometimes overlooked step in the cleaning + tidying of data. There are a couple of handy functions() available in R to help effectively execute these tasks.
